shadow.name: PROVOCATION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Obstruction, expressing through provocation

gift.name: DYNAMISM
gift.description: The gift frequency of Obstruction, expressing through dynamism

siddhi.name: LIBERATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Obstruction, expressing through liberation

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 39 shadow frequency. The provocation you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural dynamism. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from provocation to dynamism.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of provocation.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 39 consciously for 7 days, the provocation pattern will shift toward dynamism.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 39 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from provocation toward dynamism
